content:
Hi Folks! We have a weekend-long code sprint for Backdrop 1.16 happening this weekend (right now!) Zoom channel will be open while I'm here: http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings

Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing
Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.
Hi back!

@docwilmot I bumped https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4295#issuecomment-619424480 back to needs work, but I'm not actually sure if my suggestion will work. Unsure if the order of calling color_rebuild_settings() matters here.

[DX] Themes with color support: CSS changes not taking effect unless theme settings are re-saved. · Issue #4295 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need I just ran into a situation in which I made a css change and could not get it to take effect, regardless of how many times I cleared the browser cache or the Backdrop cache....
saw that, getting a coffee, then will fix it.
I'll be around later today and will have more time tomorrow.
good day everybody :)
If anyone needs a code review on anything today please lmk!

https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3110 is ready again.

Issue #4295: Color Module: Rebuild CSS by docwilmot · Pull Request #3110 · backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4295 Replaces #3082

I had forgotten about https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4197

[UX] Add configuration to exclude node types from search indexing · Issue #4197 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Description of the need Here is the excerpt from https://github.com/backdrop-contrib/search_index_options: The core search module scans all the available content, regardless of whether some content...
Is @Alan Mels available? @klonos had done a review, and I could work on implementing the recommended changes if @Alan Mels is not available.

@StPaulTim @klonos @jenlampton Sorry I'm asking about terminology again in the revisions issue. :cry: https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4354#issuecomment-619437240 Thoughts appreciated.

[D8][WP][UX] Forward Revisions · Issue #4354 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Because issue #1475 has drifted from it's original intention and gone through so many changes/discussion, we decided to close that issue and open two new issues - including this one. Descriptio...
I'm closing up the Zoom for today! I'll still poke around at a few issues here and there. Thanks folks!

Okay, back again today! http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings for anyone that wants to discuss issues.

Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing
Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.
I'm around now. Checking to see what folks are working on, but also catching up with some other emails and messages.
I'm doing code reviews on bug-fix issues - if anyone wants a review on a new feature issue, please ping me here :)

Also, I created Nate's post (from the google doc) and fixed some grammar issues - would love eyes on https://backdropcms.org/news/nate-lampton-steps-down-from-backdrop-pmc if anyone has a free minute today :) It's scheduled for 9am tomorrow.
I just read through Nate's post again and it looks good to me.
I'm not the best person to notice grammatical errors, so don't rely on me for that.
i'm here too

docwilmot said:

Is Alan Mels available? @klonos had done a review, and I could work on implementing the recommended changes if Alan Mels is not available.

Hello everyone! @docwilmot I am still here alive :) but quite busy remodeling my new house. It's the best thing to keep me busy and not to worry too much about this COVID-19 craziness. I am sorry I won't be able to actively participate in coding for now. I probably need another month to finish remodeling.

@StPaulTim do you need help with the changes we discussed this week on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2379?

Allow per-content-type customization of author and date display (a.k.a.: "submitted_by in core") · Issue #2379 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Currently, like in Drupal, there is just one option: on/off, for displaying the author and date on a content type. Ideally we'd be able to change the wording and the date format. Perhaps allow ...
I'm happy to test / code review / write code (?) as needed :)
@jenlampton Where would you like feedback/changes for the blog post?
uhoh, are there a lot of them? How about a PM? (or do you have edit access? Maybe just make them and we'll have nate review later?)
Not many. I can edit.
thank you :)
There's a typo toward the bottom of the post: "responsibility. I's an exciting"
@oadaeh (Jason Flatt) Just fixed that (and other things) :wink:
I was too busy consuming the content, so I only noticed that one thing.
Yeah, that was the main one. Rest were re-wording bits and pieces slightly.

Eyes on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3124#discussion_r415384250 would be appreciated please, before I do a final cleanup. Thanks.

Issue #4354: Forward revisions by docwilmot · Pull Request #3124 · backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4354

jenlampton said:

StPaulTim do you need help with the changes we discussed this week on https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2379?

I haven't done anything with the code. I'll have to look.

@BWPanda (Peter) - Do you think you might have time to work on this issue some more?
https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/2379

Allow per-content-type customization of author and date display (a.k.a.: "submitted_by in core") · Issue #2379 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Currently, like in Drupal, there is just one option: on/off, for displaying the author and date on a content type. Ideally we'd be able to change the wording and the date format. Perhaps allow ...
@BWPanda (Peter) or @jenlampton - If this is just about removing the changes we made to the comment module, I can probably handle that.

Remind me - if I want to make changes to @BWPanda (Peter) PR - do I need to fork his fork of Backdrop and then make changes to the PR branch and generate a PR against his branch?
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/making-changes-existing-core-pull-request-pr
@StPaulTim I usually add the other person's fork as a remote, and pull in the branch
Yeah, that's what I'm just figuring out now and testing.
You can also generate a PR against his branch, but that means he'd need to be there to merge them in :)
I just updated my own fork of Backdrop and am adding his fork as remote.
Your suggesting that I pull his branch, make my changes, and then create a new PR. Right?
Derailed by a Zoom meeting with school teacher and parents.
@StPaulTim yes :)
@docwilmot we were also derailed by a zoom meeting with all of Nate's family!
tis the season for being derailed by Zoom meetings
Anyone available for some quick help with git?
Just to be clear, I'm asking for help. Not offering it.... :-)
usually i add the persons fork as a a remote git add remotestpaultim git@...BLAH.../stpaultim/backdrop then do the code things

got a code comment from nate i dont get: (nate asked: "Needs @param docblock and the default parameter."

  /**
   * Sets this revision as the active revision.
   */
  public function setActiveRevision();
yeah; i don't see a param there to document :)
@Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy) - I'm past that and having a new problem. Do you have a minute for video chat question?
sure;

I reopened http://bit.ly/backdrop-meetings

Video Conferencing, Web Conferencing, Webinars, Screen Sharing
Zoom is the leader in modern enterprise video communications, with an easy, reliable cloud platform for video and audio conferencing, chat, and webinars across mobile, desktop, and room systems. Zoom Rooms is the original software-based conference room solution used around the world in board, conference, huddle, and training rooms, as well as executive offices and classrooms. Founded in 2011, Zoom helps businesses and organizations bring their teams together in a frictionless environment to get more done. Zoom is a publicly traded company headquartered in San Jose, CA.
asking me to create an account? idk;
I'm here with Nate
I don't know why that would be.
@docwilmot Oh, I might be wrong about that parameter. I thought we needed to pass boolean TRUE/FALSE but really only enabling it as the active is the only option.
git pull backdrop 1.x

I updated by forum question about modifying someone else's PR with the advice I got here:
https://forum.backdropcms.org/forum/making-changes-existing-core-pull-request-pr#comment-1981
I know this question comes up from time to time. Hopefully, this will be a helpful resource 4 months from now when I have forgotten how I did it this time.

@docwilmot Code review is up https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop/pull/3124#pullrequestreview-400555533

Issue #4354: Forward revisions by docwilmot · Pull Request #3124 · backdrop/backdrop
Fixes backdrop/backdrop-issues#4354
Still derailed.
Did everyone leave the Zoom? Sorry was afk.
i did;
I was also taken away.
@Nate Lampton you have time to look at a #Contrib thing?
Sure @Geoff St. Pierre (serundeputy), I'm just futzing with search issues currently.
it's in the #Contrib stream/thread
https://backdrop.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/218635-Backdrop/topic/Contrib/near/195353673

@klonos if you are around, this one might make you happy https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/3402

[UX] Standardize Label and `machine name` usage in admin listings · Issue #3402 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
Describe your issue or idea In #3395 the machine name value was moved into the View name column: I've followed that pattern in recent changes in the Paragraphs module in contrib, and I propose ...
@Nate Lampton is the Bootstrap: Page cache test one that randomly fails?
I'm running out of steam...

I would love to get this bug fixed in the next release. Anyone else think it deserves to be milestoned? The fix is only 6 characters! https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues/4344

Unable to config sync due to `reserved field names` false positive · Issue #4344 · backdrop/backdrop-issues
I'm attempting to add a new content type + fields to an existing site, by copying the current live config into the staging dir, adding the new config into staging, and running a config sync. In...
Hey @jenlampton :wave: ...the change is very simple indeed, but I would like to do some testing before I RTBC it. Can you please see my comment in the issue re STR and respond?
